title.narrative: eFishery - IoT-based smart fish feeding machines

description.narrative: Roll out a mobile-based smart feeding technology for small scale fish and shrimp farmers enabling them to become more efficient
Disbursement of funds to eFishery

title.narrative: Farmcrowdy - mobile application smallholder farmers

description.narrative: Fund development of mobile application to help smallholder farmers in rural Nigeria obtain financing for their farming activities and gain access to information, electronic payments, training and other critical services.
Disbursement of funds to Farmcrowdy

title.narrative: Agrocenta - financial inclusion product

description.narrative: Developing a financial inclusion product (AgroPay) for farmers in Rural Ghana in partnership with Vodafone Ghana, MTN Ghana and Premium Bank”.
Disbursement of funds to Agrocentra

title.narrative: Esewa Fonepay

description.narrative: Expand the reach of mobile financial services by scaling up eSewa through recruitment of SMEs to offer extended mobile money services amongst other services in the more populous eastern part of Nepal.
Disbursement of funds to Esewa Fonepay

title.narrative: Greenovator - Digital marketplace for agricultural inputs and outputs

description.narrative: Enhancement of Your Green Way Mobile Application (the “Green Way Ap”) to include marketplace features that will allow small holder farmers to sell their products directly to agri businesses at higher prices.
Disbursement of funds to Greenovator

title.narrative: Twiga Foods - Mobile-based supply platform for small and medium sized fruit and vegetable vendors

description.narrative: Build a mobile version of Twiga's food distribution service connecting food stall owners and smallholder farmers
Disbursement of funds to Twiga Foods

title.narrative: Vodafone Farmers’ Club - agricultural value added service

description.narrative: Vodafone Farmers’ Club is an agricultural value-added service (Agri VAS) with a free call bundle launched by Vodafone Ghana and VAS partner Esoko. The package offers farming advice, weather updates, market prices and free calls between Farmers’ Club members with a dedicated Farmers’ Club SIM.
Disbursement of funds to Vodafone Ghana

title.narrative: Grameenphone Krishi Sheba - agricultural value-added service

description.narrative: Grameenphone Krishi Sheba is an agricultural value-added service (Agri VAS) where users sign up for access to seasonal agricultural content from planting to post-harvest, choosing from three of 16 crops and livestock.
Disbursement of funds to Grameenphone

title.narrative: Dialog Sri Lanka’s Govi Mithuru -`

description.narrative: Dialog Sri Lanka’s Govi Mithuru (Farmer’s Friend, Uzavar Tholan in the Tamil language version) is a value-added service (VAS). Govi Mithuru promises to ‘secure crop and family health’. It aims to offer comprehensive advice to farmers in Sri Lanka with a particular focus on reducing dependence on chemical inputs, an issue frequently raised in the target market.
Disbursement of funds to Dialog

title.narrative: Airtel Malawi’s M’chikumbe (Farmer) 212 - agricultural value added service

description.narrative: Airtel Malawi’s M’chikumbe (Farmer) 212 launched in September 2015 in partnership with technology partner and content aggregator, Human Network International (HNI). The service provides farmers with access to practical information about agriculture and Airtel Money via interactive voice response (IVR) and short messaging services (SMS).
Disbursement of funds to Airtel Malawi

title.narrative: Telenor Pakistan - Khushaal Zamindar (Prosperous Landlord) - agricultural value added services

description.narrative: Khushaal Zamindar (Prosperous Landlord) is an agricultural value-added service (Agri VAS). Telenor Pakistan offers a three-layered value proposition to farmers: improve yields, save them from disaster, and encourage greater social recognition.
Disbursement of funds to Telenor Pakistan

title.narrative: Ooredoo Myanmar - Site Pyo (Myanmar) - Agricultural VAS

description.narrative: Site Pyo (Cultivation) is an agricultural smartphone application (app) launched by Ooredoo Myanmar and their content partner, Miaki. Site Pyo is designed to improve farmers’ lives by providing information that improves yields.
Disbursement of funds to Ooredoo Myanmar

title.narrative: Agromall (Nigeria) - entreprise service enabling farmers to access credit

description.narrative: Digitises farmers profiling, procurement, advisory, access to agri services suppliers and input distribution. Includes mobile money payments to farmers and input loans management.
Disbursement of funds to Agromall

title.narrative: Koltiva (Indonesia) - digitisation of the agri value chain

description.narrative: Digitises agri value chain (farmer profiling, procurement, advisory), including mobile money payments to farmers, advisory, data-driven decision agriculture, weather and crop insurance.
Disbursement of funds to Koltiva

title.narrative: Dialog Sri Lanka - digitisation of the value chain

description.narrative: Digitises agri value chain (farmer profiling, procurement, advisory), including mobile money payments to farmers, loans, savings and agri weather based insurance based on commercia microwave links (CML) data.
Disbursement of funds to Dialog

title.narrative: Jazz Pakistan - digitisation of the agri value chain

description.narrative: Digitises agri value chain (farmer profiling, procurement, advisory), including mobile money payments to farmers, lending products, insurance products and hyperlocal weather forecasts.
Disbursement of funds to Jazz Pakistan

title.narrative: Vodacom TZ - digitisation of the agri value chain

description.narrative: Digitises agri value chain (farmer profiling, including procurement, advisory), mobile money payments to farmers, digital loans, credit scoring and savings.
Disbursement of funds to Vodacom Tanzania

title.narrative: MTN Rwanda - digitisation of the agri value chain

description.narrative: Digitises the tea value chain, including farmer profiling, farmer procurement, farmer digital payment, loans, savings and insurance.
Disbursement of funds to MTN Rwanda

title.narrative: MTN Ghana - digitisation of the agri value chain

description.narrative: Digitises the cocoa value chain, including farmer profiling, farmer procurement, farmer digital payment, including farmer-centric loans and pension.
Disbursement of funds to MTN Ghana

title.narrative: Qlue - civic engagement app that allows users to actively report or share his/her neighbourhood conditions to city officials and/or businesses.

description.narrative: Scale Qlue-MyCity platform into three market-critical cities. Qlue is a civic engagement app that allows users to actively report or share his/her neighbourhood conditions to city officials and/or businesses.
Disbursement of funds to Qlue

title.narrative: ISat - Rural Telecom Network Infrastructure in rural Uganda

description.narrative: Test and evaluate iSat's mobile internet connectivity solution for unconnected rural communities in Uganda. The fund will be allocated in partnership with MTN Uganda and is set to run for approximately 18 months.
Disbursement of funds to Isat

title.narrative: NuRAN Wireless - Rural Telecom Network Infrastructure in rural Ghana

description.narrative: To test and evaluate their new, innovative mobile internet connectivity solution for unconnected rural communities in Ghana. The fund will be allocated in partnership with Vodafone Ghana and is set to run for approximately 18 months.
Disbursement of funds to NuRan

title.narrative: Kytabu - rent digital books via Mobile Money

description.narrative: Scale up the Kytabu android application for mobile devices that enables teachers and students to rent curriculum required digital textbooks using mobile money.
Disbursement of funds to Kytabu

title.narrative: Lipamobile - school fee management system for parents

description.narrative: Improve and expand LipaMobile’s mSomesa service, which allows parents and family members to pay for school tuition and other school fees, in Uganda with a focus on rural and poor areas of Uganda.
Disbursement of funds to Lipamobile

title.narrative: PrepClass - platform to increase tuitions sessions

description.narrative: Increase the number of tuition sessions by connecting learners and tutors via a web and mobile application in Nigeria. Tutors will create and upload locally relevant lessons (text/image, audio and video) on the app while learners access the app to study.
Disbursement of funds to PrepClass

title.narrative: Eneza - iEduk platform

description.narrative: Support Eneza’s post-launch growth in Cote d’Ivoire and hence enable primary and secondary students, their parents and teachers to access local, relevant, and affordable academic courses and study tools.
Disbursement of funds to Eneza

title.narrative: Optimetriks - crowdsourced mobile-based and real-time data collection service for Africa’s Fast Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) companies

description.narrative: Accelerate technical development of Optimetriks to automate service and scale presence to new geographies through existing client portfolio and new clients and to recruit more field contributors accordingly.
Disbursement of funds to Optimetriks

title.narrative: Coliba - plastics recycling

description.narrative: Deployment of a large scale and mobile-supported value chain in 10 districts across Abidjan to collect, sort, store, recycle and resell plastic waste from households and businesses.
Disbursement of funds to Coliba

title.narrative: Ruangurru - market place for education

description.narrative: Launch an online "Market Place for Personalised Education" where teachers generate content and students access the content for free, and can request personalised advice for a fee.
Disbursement of funds to Ruangurru

title.narrative: Lync - Online marketplace and service job-matching platforms

description.narrative: Fund improvements in Lynk’s job matching program. This will increase the usage and impact of the platform and benefit 1,500 lower income, blue collar workers in Kenya.
Disbursement of funds to Lync

title.narrative: Newday - Job matching platform for low-skilled workers

description.narrative: Expand and improve New Day’s existing job matching platform for low-skilled, low income workers in Myanmar.
Disbursement of funds to Newday

title.narrative: Pacific Ads Group - marketplace to match SMEs to PNG citizens

description.narrative: Continue development of marketplace platform MyWanTok.com & MyHomeTask which matches SMEs to PNG citizens. To continue expending its market reach beyond Port Moresby to a total of 5 cities across PNG through outreach events and hiring on-ground support personnel.
Disbursement of funds to Pacific Ads Group

title.narrative: Eziti - Taskmoby marketplace in Ethiopia

description.narrative: Fund the commercial launch and scale of the TaskMoby marketplace in Ethiopia. TaskMoby will leverage mobile tech to connect service providers and customers, creating income opportunities for unemployed youth and women in Ethiopia.
Disbursement of funds to Eziti

title.narrative: Biscate - marketplace in Mozambique

description.narrative: Further scale the existing service in Mozambique (through partnership with more local mobile operators) and to link workers to relevant training centres for skill-building and certifications.
Disbursement of funds to Biscate

title.narrative: Raye7 - mobile-based carpooling service for daily commuting

description.narrative: Scale up Raye7's Business to Customer ride-sharing product with large homogeneous communities (universities, business parks) who work far from residential areas in Cairo.
Disbursement of funds to Raye7

title.narrative: FieldBuzz - Deploying mobile technology to manage last-mile distribution and operations in Bangladesh

description.narrative: Develop a more standardised version of Field Buzz that will address last-mile distribution SMEs with dispersed sales and delivery agents and partners in rural areas of Bangladesh.
Disbursement of funds to FieldBuzz

title.narrative: SafeMotos - safety-focused ride-hailing service for motorcycle taxis in Africa

description.narrative: Further develop existing product to provide drivers with more digital services and improve customers' experience in ordering and paying for the service and to increase the number of trips per month.
Disbursement of funds to SafeMotos

title.narrative: MaTontine - digitise traditional savings

description.narrative: Solution to digitise traditional savings circles ('tontines') and facilitate access to credit and financial services
Disbursement of funds to MaTontine

title.narrative: SudPay - Mobile solution for MSMEs to pay taxes to municipal authorities

description.narrative: Rollout of Sudpay’s TTS Town solution in several municipalities in Dakar. By automating the collection of local taxes, Sudpay’s solution reduces fraud and increases tax revenues for municipalities, allowing them to spend more money on critical government services.
Disbursement of funds to SudPay

title.narrative: EdgePoint Digital Ltd (Jamii) - Mobile micro health insurance product via MSMEs

description.narrative: Scale microhealth insurance to small and medium enterprises across Tanzania. They will use mobile technology to promote a healthy workforce and enable small and medium enterprises’ employees and their families to access more affordable healthcare from private medical facilities in Tanzania.
Disbursement of funds to EdgePoint Digital Ltd (Jamii)

title.narrative: GiftedMom - Digital maternal health support via mobile

description.narrative: Provide personalized pre and post-natal remote support (health information, appointment reminders and doctor consultations) in Cameroon via an app, rewarding pregnant women and nursing mothers who complete antenatal & baby vaccinations with tokens they can use to pay for healthcare.
Disbursement of funds to GiftedMom

title.narrative: Kea Medicals - Medical identity solution for patients and hospitals

description.narrative: Scale KEA Medicals digital health platform across Benin by enrolling 28,500 patients, 1,500+ health workers, and interconnecting hospitals with the goal of increasing access to health services at a lower cost for rural populations.
Disbursement of funds to Kea Medicals

title.narrative: Kea Medicals - Launch new features to existing app - Free COVID-19 self-diagnosis

description.narrative: Launch a telemedicine service (the first in Benin) and built a COVID-19 self-diagnosis tool.
Disbursement of funds to Kea Medicals

title.narrative: Odoc - service connecting doctors with low-income workers virtually using mobile technology

description.narrative: Develop the oDoc Platform and scale it to low-income workers and the mass market in Sri Lanka. Making highquality primary healthcare universally accessible and affordable via chat, audio and video consultations.
Disbursement of funds to oDoc

title.narrative: oDoc - Offer online consultation for diagnosing potential COVID-19

description.narrative: Offer online consultation for diagnosing potential COVID-19 patients and helping COVID-19 patients in manage their symptoms. Set up call centers for taking care of non-app user patients through calls. Offer chat bot services and other AI based diagnostic services
Disbursement of funds to oDoc

title.narrative: Sehat Kahani - m-Health services provided by women doctors to marginalised populations through telehealth in community clinics

description.narrative: Deploy Sehat Kahani’s health technology in six clinics in urban slums and rural areas in Pakistan. The clinics will serve as a referral point for patients that need further consultations and treatment and imrpove employment opportunities for female doctors and frontline healthcare professionals in Pakistan.
Disbursement of funds to Sehat Kahani

title.narrative: Sehat Kahani - Integration of an AI chat bot that will help users conduct self-diagnosis

description.narrative: Integration of an AI chat bot that will help users conduct a quick self-diagnosis for COVID-19 Online audio & video consultations for helping potential COVID-19 patients diagnose and manage symptoms. Create a real- time dashboard to track COVID-19 cases in the country, identify infection hotspots and treatment facilities
Disbursement of funds to Sehat Kahani

title.narrative: Flowminder - Rapid Mobility Estimates from CDR for Efficient Disaster Response

description.narrative: Mobile technology to enable operators or their partners to provide automated analytics to understand where best to target relief efforts

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Flowminder

title.narrative: Nokia Saving Lives for Philippines Red Cross

description.narrative: Solution will use mobile technology to set up an instant LTE network bubble in a disaster struck region to enable rescue teams to communicate with each other and use LTE connected search drones to monitor situation

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Nokia Saving Lives

title.narrative: Refunite - "LevelApp" Mobile Data Categorization providing Refugee Income

description.narrative: Mobile technology to enable instant revenue generation for refugees and other crisis-affected communities, scaling REFUNITE’s Data Categorization Application

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Refunite

title.narrative: Lumkani - Fire Detection & Insurance for Informal Settlements

description.narrative: Scale Lumkani Fire Cover and early warning system. This will use mobile technology to monitor the early warning fire detection system and send real time SMS alerts

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Lumkani

title.narrative: Mercy Corps - Communities in Haiti Access New Technologies for Early warning/Response (CHANTER)

description.narrative: Test the CHANTER early warning and early alert platform through collaboration between Mercy Corps and Viamo Inc. This will use mobile technology in 3 communes in Haiti to better prepare their households and their livelihood activities for extreme weather events.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Mercy Corps Europe

title.narrative: Danish Refugee Council - Mobile Payments for Safe and Sustainable Water in Refugee Settlements

description.narrative: Introducing a market-based approach to provide sustainable, safe and equitable water to conflict-affected populations using mobile technology.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Danish Refugee Council

title.narrative: Danish Refugee Council - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: Adapting project roll-out plans to focus on enhancing community readiness for digital services, raising awareness of the DRC water ATM system for future use once COVID-19 restrictions are eased.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Danish Refugee Council

title.narrative: American Refugee Committee - Mwangaza ("Light"): Improving Refugee Access to Clean Energy

description.narrative: The project will provide improved energy access equipment (solar light/charging and fuel efficient cook stoves) to refugees.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to American Refugee Committee

title.narrative: United Healtcare Distributors - Empowering women in Camps and Off-Grid Communities in West Nile

description.narrative: Equipping women to access energy, create sustainable livelihoods and improve their families' health using innovative batteries and mobile phone technology

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to United Healtcare Distributors

title.narrative: United Healtcare Distributors - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: Implementing a COVID-19 response and business continuity plan, increasing distribution points for the UHD battery exchange service and further developing smart battery functionality to improve customer access and safety.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to United Healtcare Distributors

title.narrative: Norwegian Refugee Council - Provision of information on civil documents and Housing,

description.narrative: Strengthening Digital Access to Needs-Based Protection Information for IDP Women

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Norwegian Refugee Council

title.narrative: International Rescue Commitee - Providing access to protection information, safe-spaces and case management tools, to increase protection for vulnerable women and the LGBTQ community

description.narrative: Providing access to protection information, safe-spaces and case management tools, to increase protection for vulnerable women and the LGBTQ community.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to International Rescue Commitee

title.narrative: International Rescue Commitee - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: In response to the rise of gender-based violence (GBV) during the COVID-19 pandemic, replicating and expanding CuéntaNos to support women, girls, survivors of GBV and the LGBTQI community in Guatemala, providing critical information and access to key services.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to International Rescue Commitee

title.narrative: Sesame - Sesame Seeds: An interactive mobile extension

description.narrative: Leverage the power of mobile technology and Sesame’s engaging, tested content to improve key socio-emotional outcomes among Syrian refugee families

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Sesame

title.narrative: Naya Jeevan - My beautiful Thar: How Mobile Technology can Reduce Forced Displacement

description.narrative: My Beautiful Thar is a multi-stakeholder collaboration that is focused on using mobile technology to increase the resilience of Tharis

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Nava Jeevan

title.narrative: Naya Jeevan - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: Providing new mobile-enabled services in addition to veterinary care and livestock insurance, including screening and support for those with mental health disorders and for individuals at risk of GBV.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Nava Jeevan

title.narrative: British Red Cross - 121 Personal Cash Aid

description.narrative: 121 connects donors directly to people in need, allowing for inclusive, fast, transparent, low cost humanitarian aid through cash.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to British Red Cross

title.narrative: Welthungerhilfe - child growth monitor

description.narrative: A game-changing app to detect malnutrition using augmented reality and AI. Data collection in India but application has global potential.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Welthungerhilfe

title.narrative: Altech - Distributed Energy Services for Refugees (Desref)

description.narrative: Commercializing (marketing & selling) pay-as-you-go solar home systems (PAYGO SHS) to Burundian refugees living in Lusenda and Mulongwe refugee camps in Eastern DRC.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Altech

title.narrative: BBBox - Using pay-go solar to reduce protection risk for internally displaced people in urban violent and ebola outbreak context

description.narrative: Pay as you go home solar systems for refugees. Free installment, weekly payment by mobile money mpsa. Marketing and selling existing product.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to BBBox

title.narrative: Counselling Services Unit - Utilising available mobile technology for citizen engagement and action during complex emergencies with human rights violations in Zimbabwe

description.narrative: ‘We the People’ - central call centre for reporting and giving information on human rights violations. Receiving important information, reporting violations and emergencies, and receving support and referrals.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Counselling Services Unit

title.narrative: Earth Spark International - Scaling mobile-enabled, clean-powered, community-sized smart grids in rural Haiti.

description.narrative: Local micro-grids in rural comunities - energy service. Service provided through purchasing credists system on mobile or vendor.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Earth Spark International

title.narrative: Geopoll - Sahel Hunger Monitoring System

description.narrative: Remote SMS and IVR (interactive voice response) surveys to monitor and map food security and nutrition of heard to reach populations in order to provide rapid assistance. Real-time food security, nutrition, crisis scale and market-related information to guide rapid humanitarian programming and service delivery. Across Burkina Faso, Cameroon, CAR, Char, Mali, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Geopoll

title.narrative: Omnivis - Cholera Detection on Mobile Platform

description.narrative: A mobile solution to detect the cholera pathogen from the water source and collect data on cholera hotspots without the need of a lab or trained technicians. Bangladesh & Haiti.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Omnivis

title.narrative: The Rumie Initiative - A Digital Learning Revolution - Scaling access to education in Afghanistan and beyond

description.narrative: e-Learning mobile platform targeting women in Afghanistan. Includes available offline database of learning resources.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to The Rumie Initiative

title.narrative: Solidarites International - SOLIS Mobile Services

description.narrative: An open source CRM tool project to manage program services towards beneficiaries. Currently under pilot. Interface available on both SMS/SSD.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Solidarites International

title.narrative: Solidarites - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: Enhancing the SOLIS Whatsapp bot with machine learning to make conversations with refugees more efficient, provide more accurate answers on a wider range of topics (with a focus on COVID-19) and reduce the need for large group training sessions.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Solidarites International

title.narrative: Omnivis - COVID-19 pivot

description.narrative: Addressing the compounding effects of cholera and COVID-19 by expanding water testing sites, as well as partnering with MNOs to facilitate SMS alert notifications to local communities about cholera outbreaks.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Omnivis

title.narrative: Joonak - Delivery service providing logistics for micro and small e-commerce businesses

description.narrative: Digitise Joonak's delivery business, creating better optimisation and helping the business to scale.
Disbursement of funds to Joonak

title.narrative: Kargo - Online platform allowing businesses or individuals to request a truck for pick-up and delivery services

description.narrative: Improve and expand Kargo’s online platform that connects truck owners to individuals and small businesses in Myanmar.
Disbursement of funds to Karzo

title.narrative: Musanga Logistics - Mobile platform to send parcels through a network of independent cyclists, riders and drivers

description.narrative: Build and scale Musanga’s delivery service. Musanga’s delivery service will leverage mobile technology to create job opportunities for riders and increase revenue for micro-entrepreneurs, who are typically young Zambians below the age of 35.
Disbursement of funds to Musanga Logistics

title.narrative: Skyeye - Localisation and mapping solution for transportation services

description.narrative: SkyEye KokoWire Community App - To develop a platform for taxis to receive orders in real time using SkyEye’s GIS expertise to locate pick-up and drop-off location in absence of an effective address system.
Disbursement of funds to Skyeye

title.narrative: Ensibuuko - Cloud-based core banking software customised for Savings and Credit Cooperatives (SACCOs)

description.narrative: Design, build, and integrate a mobile banking platform onto Ensibuuko’s existing group banking software platform that serves village-based “savings associations”, better known as Savings and Credit Cooperatives (SACCOS) and Village Savings and Loan Associations (VSLAs).
Disbursement of funds to Ensibuuko

title.narrative: Eneza - Enabling children to continue learning during the COVID-19 pandemic

description.narrative: Build awareness of its service in the country. The grant allowed Eneza to step up its marketing activity to inform potential new users about its EdTech solution. Increase server capacity in response to new demand, build a chatbot to address queries from users, and add examination content to the service.
Disbursement of funds to Eneza

title.narrative: Agrocentra - Providing smallholder farmers with trusted information on COVID-19

description.narrative: Create a digital advisory service, known as Sentinel, which transmits health and safety information on COVID-19 to smallholder farmers through IVR channels. Providing this information to smallholder farmers is vital as they still rely heavily on non-mechanised farming, requiring them to operate in close proximity to one another, which can enable the virus to spread more easily.
Disbursement of funds to Agrocentra

title.narrative: Orange Burkina Faso - Orange software-as-a-service smart metering solution in Burkina Faso

description.narrative: Orange software-as-a-service smart metering solution in Burkina Faso
Disbursement of funds to Orange Burkina Faso

description.narrative: Orange Energy - Solar Home Systems for rural electrification
Disbursement of funds to Orange Madagascar

description.narrative: Developing Smartphone and Cook stove add-ons for PAYG solar home systems in Zambia
Disbursement of funds to Vitalite

description.narrative: Svadha powered by SaniMark

title.narrative: Electricite de Madagascar - Mobile enabled solar powered mini-grid for deep remote villages

description.narrative: Mobile enabled solar powered mini-grid for deep remote villages
Disbursement of funds to Electricite de Madagascar

title.narrative: Electrict Vine Industries - Solar PV Microgrids: TCASH mobile money integration and device leasing pilot for eletrification of rural areas in Sumbia

description.narrative: Solar PV Microgrids: TCASH mobile money integration and device leasing pilot for eletrification of rural areas in Sumbia

title.narrative: Safe Water Network - Optimising the Small Water Enterprise Model through mobile money and M2M technologies

title.narrative: Safe Water Network - The Ghana government issued a directive to provide free water to domestic users at the start of the COVID-19 pandemic. This increased the strain on SWN’s operations, as a result of greater demand.

description.narrative: Hire additional water station operators, while enabling the organisation to undertake additional maintenance activities to maintain rapid repair times and frequent water quality testing.

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Safe Water Network

title.narrative: Loowatt - support the servicing and maintenance of waterless, container-based household toilets in the context of the COVID-19 pandemic

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Loowatt

title.narrative: CBSA - Mobile application and web tool for Container Based Sanitation providers

description.narrative: Mobile application and web tool for Container Based Sanitation providers

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to CBSA

title.narrative: Uduma - PAYG e-Water pumps: Mobile based cashless payment facility

description.narrative: PAYG e-Water pumps: Mobile based cashless payment facility

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Uduma

title.narrative: Uduma - In the context of the COVID-19 pandemic, install 333 foot-operated handwashing facilities near its water points and to supply over 18,000 bars of soap to communities. Launch a ‘clean hands’ campaign, which aimed to increase handwashing in Burkina Faso.

description.narrative: In the context of the COVID-19 pandemic, install 333 foot-operated handwashing facilities near its water points and to supply over 18,000 bars of soap to communities. Launch a ‘clean hands’ campaign, which aimed to increase handwashing in Burkina Faso.

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Uduma

title.narrative: Africa 118 - Providing an affordable Mobile Digital Starter Pack to Ethiopian SMEs to help them to build a strong digital presence and grow their business.

description.narrative: Connecting 10,000 Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in Ethiopia to the internet to access new markets with an innovative Mobile Digital Starter Pack (DSP). The project also provide Digital Skills training to entrepreneurs to easily update and manage their online presence.​
Disbursement of funds to Africa 118

title.narrative: Ensibuuko - Developing a localised version of a digital skills training kit, adapted for rural customers

description.narrative: Ensibuuko will develop a localised version of a digital skills training kit, adapted for rural customers and will leverage its existing network of Digital Field Agents to deliver the training kit to village savings groups in various rural locations of Uganda. As a result, Ensibuuko aims to improve uptake for its own digital app for village savings groups.
Disbursement of funds to Ensibuuko

title.narrative: Scholar X - developing and launching a new digital skills learning app called LearnAM which will provide basic digital skills to the underserved

description.narrative: ScholarX aims to develop and launch a new digital skills learning app called LearnAM which will provide basic digital skills to the underserved. The app will be available in local Nigerian languages and will teach users skills such as opening an email account, creating an online presence for their business, and using Google to search for basic information. The app will be developed on the KaiOS platform which means it will be accessible via affordable, internet-enabled feature phones.
Disbursement of funds to Scholar X

title.narrative: WID Energy Africa - providing rural communities in Zambia with 20 community-based distribution hubs for Pay-As-You-Go smartphones which will be pre-loaded with starting bundles

description.narrative:
WidEnergy Africa aims to provide rural communities in Zambia with 20 community-based distribution hubs for Pay-As-You-Go smartphones which will be pre-loaded with starting bundles. These hubs will be a one-stop shop for community energy, water and connectivity.
WidEnergy Africa also plans to implement community-based digital inclusion hubs which will provide digital skills training to help customers learn how to use the internet and access essential digital services.​ Free trainings will be organised monthly, with a particular focus on underserved groups such as women and persons with disabilities.
Disbursement of funds to WID Energy Africa

title.narrative: Zonful - reducing the usage gap in Zimbabwe through an affordable Pay As You Go model

description.narrative: By procuring, marketing and distributing low-cost smartphones and data bundles with 24 month data plans from Econet, Zonful Energy aims to reduce the usage gap in Zimbabwe through an affordable Pay As You Go model. The affordable smartphones and data bundles will be available on this PAYG system to both customers and non-customers of Zonful’s Solar Home System.
Disbursement of funds to Zonful

title.narrative: Vceela - enabling artisans to build their own digital presence and to gain access to the global market, helping to bridge the digital gap that often leaves artisans vulnerable to exploitation

description.narrative: Through this project, Vceela plan to scale their existing solution in order to reach 50,000 artisans who will all be trained to use mobile services. Vceela’s mobile technology will enable artisans to build their own digital presence and to gain access to the global market, helping to bridge the digital gap that often leaves artisans vulnerable to exploitation.
Disbursement of funds to Vceela

title.narrative: Knowledge Platform - providing access to quality education through a bundled learning app aimed at 5 to 15-year-old children in Pakistan

description.narrative: Knowledge Platform plan to roll out mobile educational devices through micro-financing, with the ultimate goal to introduce one education device per family. They aim to provide access to quality education through a bundled learning app aimed at 5 to 15-year-old children in Pakistan. They will target the Affordability barrier by offering a smartphone/tablet financing scheme to underserved communities, enabling users to pay in instalments
Disbursement of funds to Knowledge Platform

title.narrative: Navana Tech - developing a new conversational AI voice bot, enabling digital actions through two-way conversations in 5 Indian languages

description.narrative: Navana Tech plans to develop a new conversational AI voice bot, enabling digital actions through two-way conversations in 5 Indian languages (Hindi, Gujarati, Tamil, Assamese, Punjabi). The voice bot will be integrated into financial services and e-commerce apps making them far more widely accessible for those who would previously have been unable to use them due to the language barrier or a lack of digital skills. The AI voice bot will help users to build confidence in using mobile apps by offering it in their local language with no typing or reading requirements.
Disbursement of funds to Navana Tech

title.narrative: AWCC - Lease-to-own solar home systems: Mobile money enabled energy access in Afghanistan

description.narrative: Lease-to-own solar home systems: Mobile money enabled energy access in Afghanistan
Disbursement of funds to AWCC

title.narrative: Orenda - increase the education opportunities for children living outside the major cities of Pakistan by expanding both the curriculum and reach of the Taleemabad app to Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities

description.narrative: The Orenda Project aims to increase the education opportunities for children living outside the major cities of Pakistan by expanding both the curriculum and reach of the Taleemabad app to Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities. They plan to achieve this by developing the app for KaiOS phones, thus tackling the affordability and accessibility barriers. The Orenda Project also plans to launch their B2B solution for low-cost schools by developing an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system to further improve accessibility for the underserved segment
Disbursement of funds to Orenda

title.narrative: DeafTawk - Empower the Deaf community by providing quality sign language interpretation service through digital technology

description.narrative: Further develop DeafTawk's existing mobile application by adding an AI bot feature that will enable the application to automatically interpret voice/text into sign language for the hearing-impaired users. Moreover, in partnership with an MNO (Jazz), DeafTawk will launch the Voice over IP (VoIP) service which will enable deaf users to converse using their smartphone with someone who uses a feature phone. Deaftawk will also use this grant to launch a training programme for interpreters and an awareness programme to educate users on how to use Deaftawk mobile application for sign language interpretation service.
Disbursement of funds to Deaftawk

title.narrative: ISTEM - Empower the global population of people with disabilities through technology and community.

description.narrative: Improve access to inaccessible video, audio,and documents to users with visual and hearing impairments. These users are typically students in learning institutions or general users seeking employment or improved accessibility to information. The grant will also provide an app accessibility feature that runs in the background of mobile applications, enabling visually impaired users to interact with inaccessible user interface elements of a mobile application
Disbursement of funds to ISTEM

title.narrative: SignAble - Enable deaf and hearing people to connect with each other via a smartphone app that provides sign language interpretation via live interpreters in real-time video. ​

description.narrative: SignAble’s interpretation service is a new service in India. The app will enable2-way calls and face2face conversations between deaf/hearing impaired via a network of interpreters.
Disbursement of funds to SignAble

title.narrative: Signs Media - Provide affordable high quality virtual on-demand sign language interpretation services to the hearing impaired, businesses and professionals through the assistALL mobile app, so as to enable them to communicate in a seamless manner when conducting their everyday business transactions.

description.narrative: Further develop the minimum viable product (MVP) of assistALL mobile Application into a market ready product and acquire Interpreters, B2B and B2C customers. The assistALL mobile application aims to provide an affordable, high quality, virtual on-demand sign language interpretation service for the hearing impaired, businesses and professionals. Further development will include developing the profile module of the Interpreter, enhancing the privacy and security measures, and integrating the payment module.
Disbursement of funds to Signs Media

title.narrative: The Freetown Waste Transformers - turning organic waste into electricity, replacing diesel generators with green technology to reduce the cost of energy and increase the reliability of energy and heat

description.narrative: Digitise the waste collection process by implementing a GPS mobile mapping app to improve the efficiency of existing waste coordination
Disbursement of funds to Freetown Waste Transformers

title.narrative: Powerstove - PAYG smokeless biomass cookstove that cooks food five times faster than local stoves and generates micro off-grid electricity

description.narrative: Produce, sell and scale-up distribution of cookstove units to urban poor families in Nigeria through a pay-as-you-cook model.
Disbursement of funds to Powerstove

title.narrative: Swacch Sustainable Solutions - Digitising existing dry waste supply chain from collection to processing.

description.narrative: Digitise their existing dry waste supply chain from collection to processing. Recircle aggregates the collection and processing of dry waste to sell Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) credits to businesses
Disbursement of funds to Swacch Sustainable Solutions

title.narrative: Diyalo - Automating water production using IoT technology and water sensors at water pump sites

description.narrative: Automate water production using IoT technology and water sensors at water pump sites. This will allow water utility companies to optimise their capacity to determine water leakages and reduce non-revenue water by at least 10 per cent

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Diyalo

title.narrative: Janajal - Supremus - Pilot 25 Janajal Water on Wheels (WOWs) in 3-5 slums in Delhi

description.narrative: Deliver safe and affordable drinking water in three to five slums in Delhi through the launch of 25 Water on Wheels (WOWs)

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Janajal

title.narrative: Bhumijo - Develop smart toilet management technology to improve the service quality.

description.narrative: Provide complete automation of public toilets with a touchless entry system, and integration of an Android mobile application for users to pay for an associated subscription, digitally

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Bhumijo

title.narrative: SoSo Care - purchase recyclable waste from low-income people and sell to middlemen and recycling companies. Proceeds are used to provide health insurance premium as payment to the households

description.narrative: Scale up their current offering where they purchase recyclable waste from low-income individuals and sell to middlemen and recycling companies. Proceeds are used to provide health insurance premiums as payment to the households who opt into the scheme
Disbursement of funds to Soso Care

title.narrative: Regenize - scale up their free recycling collection services to 4,000 household, setting up 7 new Decentralized Recycling Hubs

description.narrative: Establishing new Decentralised Recycling Hubs (DRHs) and developing version 2.0 of the Recycling App and Remali App
Disbursement of funds to Regenize

title.narrative: Koolboks - launch and scale the product in 12 markets in Nigeria targeting fish traders, majority of whom are women

description.narrative: Following a successful pilot program to test consumer response to Koolbok’s solar-powered refrigerators enabled with pay-as-you-go (PAYG) technology, Koolboks want to launch and scale the product in 12 markets in Nigeria, targeting fish traders, the majority of whom are women
Disbursement of funds to Koolboks

title.narrative: ATEC - scaling their current product i.e. electric cooking stove called eCook

description.narrative: Develop an Android mobile application that will be integrated with an eCook stove. The app will show users real-time electricity usage data, payment status, carbon offset data etc. enabling them to pay as little as $5 a month.
Disbursement of funds to ATEC

title.narrative: Aquarech - IoT-based precision farming service

description.narrative: Scale their existing IoT-based precision farming service by increasing the number of fish farmers using it and provide them with access to high quality fish feeds to improve the productivity life cycle of fish stock. The project will also include the launch a new service for Fish traders to gain access to fish stock in a transparent way
Disbursement of funds to Aquarech

title.narrative: Simusolar - Smart IoT BLE (Bluetooth) fishing light

description.narrative: Launch a smart IoT BLE (Bluetooth) fishing light that is locatable, trackable, energy efficient with dimming capability, and remote control through bundling it with a smartphone.
Disbursement of funds to Simusolar

title.narrative: Komunidad - hyper-local climate monitoring solution and early warning system (EWS) for the Siargao province

description.narrative: Develop hyper-local climate monitoring solution and early warning system (EWS) for the Siargao province that is prone to climate shocks and in need for an intervention to build up the communities' resilience
Disbursement of funds to Komunidad

title.narrative: Bakhabar Kissan - deploy hyper localised weather stations

description.narrative: Deploy 200 weather stations and further develop additional digital channels such as mobile app to provide farmers with accurate hyper-local weather information (nowcast and forecasts).
Disbursement of funds to Bakhabar Kissan

title.narrative: Hello Tractor - to increase farmers' earnings by optimizing use of rainfall data provided through MNO’s CML data to plan mechanization activities

description.narrative: Increase farmers' earnings by optimizing use of rainfall data provided through MNO’s CML data to plan mechanization activities that help vulnerable communities
Disbursement of funds to Hello Tractor

title.narrative: GeoKrishi - enhance the existing farming advisory services to strengthen farmers' resilience in case of climate shocks

description.narrative: Enhance the existing farming advisory services to strengthen farmers' resilience in case of climate shocks and reduce the impact of climate-related hazards
Disbursement of funds to GeoKrishi

title.narrative: Benaa - IoT system in decentralized treatment units in order to monitor the quality and usage of the treated wastewater

description.narrative: Implement IoT systems in systems, consisting of solar-powered decentralized sewage treatment units that transform wastewater into safe irrigation water for farmers

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Benaa

title.narrative: J-Palm - delivering a sustainable, no-deforestation palm product that makes communities more resilient to climate change

description.narrative: Development of a traceability app on a blockchain platform to trace where wild palm oil is sourced/harvested across the value chain to where it ends up in final retail stores.
Disbursement of funds to J-Palm

title.narrative: Lersha - Green Agro - to scale digital platform service and add financial services (insurance with credit) to improve subsistence farmers’ climate resilience.

description.narrative: Scale a digital platform (Lersha) for smallholder farmers where they can access farm input services, mechanization solutions, and agro-climate advisory services. Add financial services (insurance with credit) to improve subsistence farmers’ climate resilience
Disbursement of funds to Lersha - Green Agro

title.narrative: CoAmana - improve adoption of climate adaptation practices by improving and scaling access, knowledge and affordability through the Co-Amana digital marketplace

description.narrative: Improve adoption of climate adaptation practices by improving and scaling access, knowledge and affordability through the Co-Amana digital marketplace. E.g. Provide access to climate change resilience information and products through the provision of a new mobile app
Disbursement of funds to CoAmana

title.narrative: Crop2Cash - demonstrate how digital solutions can support vulnerable communities to adapt their livelihoods against climate change

description.narrative: Demonstrate how digital solutions can support vulnerable communities to adapt their livelihoods against climate change, through, among others, access to climate smart practices and agricultural insurance
Disbursement of funds to Crop2Cash

title.narrative: Dayaxa (DFEC) - provide better earnings for resin farmers in Somaliland while harvesting in a more sustainable manner to preserve natural resources

description.narrative: Provide better earnings for resin farmers in Somaliland while harvesting in a more sustainable manner to preserve natural resources, through the development of a traceability app on a blockchain platform
Disbursement of funds to Dayaxa (DFEC)

title.narrative: Action Aid - will focus on early action, preparedness and resilience building by providing data generated by mobile technology depicting the movement of people.

description.narrative: ActionAid Cambodia will focus on early action, preparedness and resilience building by providing data generated by mobile technology depicting the movement of people.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Action Aid Cambodia

title.narrative: Buraq - enable local communities in the vulnerable region of Pakistan to take timely action in anticipation of any humanitarian hazards.

description.narrative: Buraq will upgrade existing weather monitoring systems and deploy new automated weather monitoring systems in the flood prone areas of Gilgit Baltistan in Pakistan enabling accurate early warning communication

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Buraq

title.narrative: Naxa - scale an Anticipatory Action AA platform, i.e., Digital and Spatial Technologies for Anticipatory Action “DASTAA” to flood prone wards of the lower Mahakali basin with the aim of enhancing anticipatory actions and reducing the impacts of disaster at the household level

description.narrative: Scale an Anticipatory Action AA platform, i.e., Digital and Spatial Technologies for Anticipatory Action “DASTAA” to flood prone wards of the lower Mahakali basin with the aim of enhancing anticipatory actions and reducing the impacts of disaster at the household level. This approach includes profiling the disaster risks of each household, prior to flooding, monitoring thresholds, enabling local government and humanitarian agencies to take evidence-based decisions for targeted disaster preparedness and recovery programmes

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Naxa

title.narrative: People in Need - develop a monitoring system based on IoT and connected sensors that integrates with government tools and disseminates flood warnings via mobile phones directly to the impacted population

description.narrative: Develop a monitoring system based on IoT and connected sensors that integrates with government tools and disseminates flood warnings via mobile phones directly to the impacted population

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to People in Need

title.narrative: Rumsan - build and pilot a multi- signature based anticipatory action programme in an existing mobile technology cash and voucher assistance (CVA) platform

description.narrative: Build and pilot a multi- signature based anticipatory action programme in an existing mobile technology cash and voucher assistance (CVA) platform. The solution will enable timely distribution of CVA to effected populations before and during a natural disaster.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Rumsan

title.narrative: Synnefa - integrate satellite imagery into their farm management platform, FarmCloud, to provide real-time data on crop health and weather patterns to smallholder farmers in Kenya

description.narrative: Integrate satellite imagery into their farm management platform, FarmCloud, to provide real-time data on crop health and weather patterns to smallholder farmers in Kenya

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Synnefa

title.narrative: Thamo - establish a cost-effective early warning flood system by repurposing existing mobile technology, including the use of commercial microwave links

description.narrative: Establish a cost-effective early warning flood system by repurposing existing mobile technology, including the use of commercial microwave links

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to Tahmo

title.narrative: Tearfund - use mobile technology to raise awareness of the benefits of insurance, as well as equipping agropastoralists facing climate change related shocks with access to timely climate information, and simple, parametric cover for extreme climate events

description.narrative: Use mobile technology to raise awareness of the benefits of insurance, as well as equipping agropastoralists facing climate change related shocks with access to timely climate information, and simple, parametric cover for extreme climate events

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

description.narrative: Disbursement of funds to TearFund

title.narrative: Crop2X - uses artificial intelligence and agricultural knowledge to develop data-driven insights to create high-yield agriculture farms. Crop2X’s platform provides information to optimize day-to-day farm operations, such as optimum quantity of fertilizers, early detection of anomalies or pest predictions

description.narrative: The proposed project will address agricultural inefficiencies through the deployment of soil probes and a GIS-based crop monitoring platform. The solution will empower vulnerable farming communities with real-time information, which will enable them to save up to 50% of their water resources, increase their crop yields by 30%, and save 30% of their inputs, leading to improved resource allocation, higher income, and enhanced food security.
Disbursement of funds to Crop2X

title.narrative: Sommalife - operates as a social enterprise that uses a software platform to help rural communities generate sustainable income. They empower female shea farmers, making them more resilient to climate changes. Sommalife also focuses on educating farmers to improve the quality and quantity of their crops and connects these farmers with well-known global food and cosmetic companies, ensuring they get fair payment for their products

description.narrative:
The proposed project aims: To enhance the Sommalife software platform, that ensures transparency and traceability throughout the shea value chain, with AI and Machine Learning capabilities for efficient traceability conservation and monitoring. This will help reduce deforestation by protecting existing shea trees and training farmers to practice reforestation.
To register 110,000 women farmers and 1,500 communities on the platform, train and connect 15,000 women farmers to fair international markets, and raise 50,000 early-maturing shea seedlings while establishing 1,500 acres of conservation parklands.
Disbursement of funds to Sommalife

title.narrative: UjuziKilimo - an agri- tech company providing a platform that advances data-driven decisions for smallholder farmers by collecting, organizing and making sense of agricultural data. The company has developed SoilPal - a device that uses IoT sensors to help farmers understand soil health

description.narrative:
UjuziKilimo will roll out Soil Pal, a proprietary handheld portable device that has high-sensitive sensors to detect, measure and analyze 13 soil parameters within 5 minutes. These parameters include soil moisture, temperature, acidity levels, salinity levels, levels of macro-nutrients, GPS data etc.
Farmers will then receive SMS recommendations on which carbon-negative and affordable fertilizers to use, the quantity of water and farm chemicals they should apply for a specific crop for better yields.
The proposed grant project will focus on assembly of 35 Soil Pal devices and scaling access to soil testing services to 50,000 farmers.
Disbursement of funds to UjuziKilimo

title.narrative: HydroNeo - a company that offers a Smart Farm System designed to address inefficiencies within the shrimp farming industry, such as production failure and high operational cost. HydroNeo integrates smart technology, such as farm monitoring automation, weather warning and disease detection, resulting in energy savings, improved profitability and productivity for farmers.

description.narrative:
GSMA funding will be utilized to create and promote the "HydroNeo Digital Farm App," accessible to all shrimp farmers and helping mitigate climate-change-induced risks.
The HydroNeo Digital Farm App will feature six main functionalities, including (1) regional climate and weather data, (2) disease warning and reporting, (3) smartphone-based shrimp measurement, growth analytics, and disease detection, (4) domestic shrimp market price index with trends and predictions, (5) financial performance overview for farmers, and (6) market demand overview from processors.
Disbursement of funds to HydroNeo

title.narrative: InQube - a company that operates a B2B software as a service technology (SaaS) platform to enhance food security, promote sustainable farming, and establish connections between farmers and stakeholders in the agriculture value chain

description.narrative:
GSMA funding will be used to develop GreenQube, a SaaS platform with IoT sensors and digital payment capabilities. The platform will digitally integrate with stakeholders through the last-mile farm aggregator, connecting farmers and providing advisory services. GreenQube will address challenges from evolving pest and disease patterns, promoting the transition to modern sustainable farming practices. It will support regenerative farming methods like composting, crop diversity, and organic farming.
Furthermore, the platform will contribute to a carbon offset financing project for mangrove reforestation with digital tracking, enhancing financial support for farmers by 2027.
Disbursement of funds to InQube

title.narrative: SenzAgro - a leader in precision agriculture technologies. Their solution optimizes sustainable productivity by enabling the farmers to grow the crops efficiently, produce better and higher yields, while using fewer resources in terms of water, land and energy. They achieve this through their technology, deep agronomic expertise and capacity-building training

description.narrative:
SenzAgro is proposing a transparent Digital Agriculture Value Chain platform that communicates proper regenerative agriculture practices such as timely weather information and soil health conditions to farmers, enabling them to produce sustainable yields and facilitating efficient interactions with all other stakeholders in the agriculture value chain, such as buyers, input providers, delivery services, and more SMEs.
The proposed project is to develop the existing SenzAgro's Agricore platform and expand to new markets in the northern part of Sri Lanka. Specifically for this project, they would add localized weather information, soil health information, and refine the regenerative agri advisories & marketplace features. They also aim to onboard 500 young smallholder farmers and 200 agribusinesses.
Disbursement of funds to SenzAgro

title.narrative: Aloi - helping informal sector entrepreneurs to access business finance targeting green sectors. Aloi’s technology increases the trust of lenders to lend to micro-entrepreneurs through an automatic loan monitoring and alternative credit data

description.narrative:
This project will help dairy farmers access training and loans to adopt climate-smart milk production practices, including using community forestry land and agro-forestry for fodder production, biogas production from manure for domestic energy use, water conservation techniques, and solar panels for cooling storage.
For dairy farmers interested in access to finance, Aloi will help them create digital credit profiles. The loans will be disbursed digitally using Aloi’s technology to monitor loan use via the accredited vendor ecosystem which will be aggregated and linked with financial institutions for approval. Aloi will also work with milk traders to digitize the payments to dairy farmers to enable them to track their income and loan repayments.
Disbursement of funds to Aloi

title.narrative: Câm Dairy - a Nigerian dairy company that is working to aggregate raw milk collected from dairying communities and processing it into packaged pasteurized fresh milk, which it delivers to consumers. It is driven by a vision to lead Nigeria to reach self-sufficiency in dairy production to meet the nutritional needs of its people; to provide women with sustainable incomes; and to lift smallholder households out of poverty.

description.narrative: Develop an inventory management system that tracks raw materials and finished products from farm to customer. Inventory management is a key risk area, and a digitized system will help reduce risks. Through the inventory system, Cam Dairy will be able to track and visualize key indicators such as demand, inbound supply, production, outbound supply, and sales. Enhanced tracking of supplies and sales will help reduce food wastage and increase demand for pastoralists’ milk.
Disbursement of funds to Cam Dairy

title.narrative: Pricepally - an innovative online grocery platform that uses technology, data, and partnerships to make affordable and nutritious food accessible while reducing food waste and creating a resilient food system. ​

description.narrative: The project will focus on: Enhancing the existing consumer app by leveraging gamification to boost customer acquisition and demand. enhancing the operational app to streamline the supply processes, leverage demand data sharing with farmers and producers to enhance production planning and minimize distribution challenges that result in post harvest losses. Developing an integrated inventory management for wholesalers, effectively addressing inventory issues, overstocking, understocking, and thereby minimizing food losses.​
Disbursement of funds to PricePally

title.narrative: Farm to Feed (FTF) - a startup that tackles the problem of food loss by creating a market for imperfect/surplus produce. Imperfect produce are crops rescued from farms that would have been otherwise written off as a loss because the farmer did not meet product specification/market expectation e.g., imperfect/odd looking crops. FTF connects smallholder farmers to buyers enabling them to sell their produce and earn additional income whilst reducing food wastage.

description.narrative: The proposed project will include the following activities: Technical development of FTF digital platforms. This includes developing a USSD platform and improving their farm engagement app to engage more farmers to off-take their imperfect/surplus produce. Develop and market their e-commerce platform to onboard more B2B buyers to offtake more imperfect and surplus produce from farmers. Establish additional supply hubs that enable FTF to aggregate more produce and engage more farmers in rural Kenya. A supply hub is an aggregation center to off-take agricultural produce. This will enable farmers to easily access FTF digital solutions and increase their incomes which will improve their resilience to climate shocks.
Disbursement of funds to Farm to Feed

title.narrative: Monsoon Tea Company - specializes in creating and retailing unique blends of native tea grown in harmony with the forests of Northern Thailand. By growing tea in the forest, the company contributes to preventing deforestation, preserving biodiversity, and providing local communities with a stable source of income

description.narrative: The proposed project seeks to further empower the tea-cultivating upland communities by developing a mobile biodiversity traceability application, tracking tea products from farmers in the uplands of Thailand to customers all over the world. ​ The biodiversity traceability solution is a new product which will be used to collect data on biodiversity using traditional indicators and AI-empowered biosensors. The data is then used to attribute a biodiversity score to each forest tea farming plot. The scoring is used to award farmers with virtual biodiversity tokens based on the size of the land and the biodiversity score. Monsoon Tea Company will utilize the grant to develop the traceability application, build the capacity of farmers and other stakeholders, track biodiversity preservation and commercialize the solution.
Disbursement of funds to Monsoon Tea

title.narrative: Bizy Tech -aims at revolutionizing the agricultural landscape with KILIMO BaNDO, a comprehensive suite of digital products and services for stakeholders in the farming sector facilitated by the KILIMO DATA HUB platform. With a firm commitment to sustainability, Bizy Tech digital solutions optimize farming practices, enhance productivity, contribute to food security and improve farmers’ income.

description.narrative: The proposed project aims to empower smallholder farmers by delivering precise weather information, forecast advisory, and tailored guidance on sustainable agricultural methods such as soil preservation techniques, planting climate adaptive crops, and optimal irrigation schedule to manage the water for irrigation wisely. By integrating AI models for evaluating soil health, the initiative aims to provide farmers in Singida and Dodoma regions with targeted insights relevant to their specific geographic areas. Additionally, the project addresses the challenge of financial access for smallholder farmers by connecting them with a range of financial services, including savings, loans, and credit supply.
Disbursement of funds to Bizy Tech
